name: Whack A Tako
description:
Quick fan game I made based on the popular hololive vtuber  @ninomaeinanis. Recomended platform: PC (She mentioned the idea on stream and fulfilled it)

Click on title screen to get menu.

Click on the takos to whack 'em

[Game dev still in progress]
